verses.text: \w We|strong="G3870"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w*, \add as\add* workers \w together|strong="G4903"\w* \add with him\add*, \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \add you\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* that \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, I have \w heard|strong="G1873"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* in a \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w accepted|strong="G1184"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* have I \w succoured|strong="G0997"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*: \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \add is\add* the \w accepted|strong="G2144"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*; \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \add is\add* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.)

\w Giving|strong="G1325"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w offence|strong="G4349"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* any \w thing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* \w be|strong="G3469"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w blamed|strong="G3469"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add* \w approving|strong="G4921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w ministers|strong="G1249"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w afflictions|strong="G2347"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w necessities|strong="G0318"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w distresses|strong="G4730"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w stripes|strong="G4127"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w imprisonments|strong="G5438"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w tumults|strong="G0181"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w labours|strong="G2873"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w watchings|strong="G0070"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fastings|strong="G3521"\w*;

\w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w pureness|strong="G0054"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w kindness|strong="G5544"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w unfeigned|strong="G0505"\w*,

\w By|strong="G1722"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w armour|strong="G3696"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* on the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* on the \w left|strong="G0710"\w*,

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w honour|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dishonour|strong="G0819"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* evil \w report|strong="G1426"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* good \w report|strong="G2162"\w*: \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w deceivers|strong="G4108"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add yet\add* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*;

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w unknown|strong="G0050"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add yet\add* well \w known|strong="G1921"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w dying|strong="G0599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, we \w live|strong="G2198"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w chastened|strong="G3811"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w killed|strong="G2289"\w*;

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w sorrowful|strong="G3076"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w alway|strong="G0104"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G5463"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w making|strong="G4148"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w rich|strong="G4148"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add yet\add* \w possessing|strong="G2722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

O \add ye\add* \w Corinthians|strong="G2881"\w*, \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* is \w open|strong="G0455"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* is \w enlarged|strong="G4115"\w*.

Ye \w are|strong="G4729"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w straitened|strong="G4729"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* ye are \w straitened|strong="G4729"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* your \w own|strong="G5216"\w* \w bowels|strong="G4698"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* for a \w recompence|strong="G0489"\w* in the \w same|strong="G0846"\w*, (I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* as \w unto|strong="G5613"\w* \add my\add* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*,) \w be|strong="G4115"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w enlarged|strong="G4115"\w*.

Be \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* unequally yoked \w together|strong="G2086"\w* with \w unbelievers|strong="G0571"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G3352"\w* hath \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0458"\w*? \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w communion|strong="G2842"\w* hath \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w concord|strong="G4857"\w* hath \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w Belial|strong="G0955"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w part|strong="G3310"\w* hath he that \w believeth|strong="G4103"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* an \w infidel|strong="G0571"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w agreement|strong="G4783"\w* hath the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I will \w dwell|strong="G1774"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* walk \w in|strong="G1704"\w* \add them\add*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* come \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G3319"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be ye \w separate|strong="G0873"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w touch|strong="G0680"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \add thing\add*; and \w I|strong="G2504"\w* will \w receive|strong="G1523"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* will \w be|strong="G2071"\w* a \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*.
